channel.title: Players cannot connect
channel.description: I think im having a proiblem with my cache not getting downloaded by the players... but im having a problem with playerrs not being ablew to connect to my server if someone is experienced can they please help me? i portforwarded everything is set up but it seems like its not connecting correctly or something i have no idea. could someone please try and help me on this?

item.title: Players cannot connect
item.dc:creator: @masan05 masan05
item.description:
@masan05 wrote:

look in client and source files for 127.0.0.1 and change it to your ip, if haven’t already. Then they need to reinstall/download your client.

Read full topic
